document_data.name: Gont
document_data.mainbody: '''Gont of Riatavin''' was a [[human]] [[thief]] from [[Riatavin]] who became trapped in the right-most chamber of the [[Facet sphere]] whilst fighting a group of [[drow]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He fought with a standard ''[[short sword]]'' and ''[[leather armor]]''.
document_data.History: Gont was fighting a drow war party with his group near the gates of [[Ust Natha]], where he became trapped by a device known as the Facet sphere. He was not trapped in the strange device for too long, because his mind was still sound. He may have been freed by [[Gorion's Ward]], and after this, Gont told them of the surrounding areas, such as a [[kuo-toa]] camp to the east.
